General.Name: Taiwan Semiconductor Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Semiconductor Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets discrete devices and power ICs in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through Rectifier and Bar Code Printer segments. The company's discrete devices include bridge rectifiers, diodes, DIACs and thyristors, ESD protection products, MOSFETs, and transistors; and power ICs comprise amplifiers and comparators, analog ICs, linear voltage regulators, switching regulators, voltage references, hall effect sensors, and lighting ICs. Its products are used in a range of applications in the electronics industry, including automotive, computer, consumer, industrial, telecom, and photovoltaic. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 205, Beixin Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
